class.name: EnumPersistenceDelegate
class.javadoc: The persistence delegate for enum classes. Sergey A. Malenkov

class.name: java_util_Date_PersistenceDelegate
class.javadoc: The persistence delegate for java.util.Date classes. Do not extend DefaultPersistenceDelegate to improve performance and to avoid problems with java.sql.Date, java.sql.Time and java.sql.Timestamp. Sergey A. Malenkov

class.name: java_sql_Timestamp_PersistenceDelegate
class.javadoc: The persistence delegate for java.sql.Timestamp classes. It supports nanoseconds. Sergey A. Malenkov

class.name: java_util_Collections
class.javadoc:
The base class for persistence delegates for inner classes that can be created using {@link Collections}.
Sergey A. Malenkov

class.name: java_util_EnumMap_PersistenceDelegate
class.javadoc: The persistence delegate for java.util.EnumMap classes. Sergey A. Malenkov

class.name: java_util_EnumSet_PersistenceDelegate
class.javadoc: The persistence delegate for java.util.EnumSet classes. Sergey A. Malenkov

class.name: java_awt_Insets_PersistenceDelegate
class.javadoc:
The persistence delegate for {@link Insets}. It is impossible to use {@link DefaultPersistenceDelegate}because this class does not have any properties.
Sergey A. Malenkov

class.name: java_awt_Font_PersistenceDelegate
class.javadoc:
The persistence delegate for {@link Font}. It is impossible to use {@link DefaultPersistenceDelegate}because size of the font can be float value.
Sergey A. Malenkov

class.name: java_awt_AWTKeyStroke_PersistenceDelegate
class.javadoc:
The persistence delegate for {@link AWTKeyStroke}. It is impossible to use {@link DefaultPersistenceDelegate}because this class have no public constructor.
Sergey A. Malenkov

class.name: javax_swing_border_MatteBorder_PersistenceDelegate
class.javadoc:
The persistence delegate for {@link MatteBorder}. It is impossible to use {@link DefaultPersistenceDelegate}because this class does not have writable properties.
Sergey A. Malenkov

class.name: sun_swing_PrintColorUIResource_PersistenceDelegate
class.javadoc:
The persistence delegate for {@link PrintColorUIResource}. It is impossible to use {@link DefaultPersistenceDelegate}because this class has special rule for serialization: it should be converted to {@link ColorUIResource}.
PrintColorUIResource#writeReplace
Sergey A. Malenkov
